===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=えぼしどり|烏帽子|tr1=eboshi|t1=an ancient style of hat worn by Japanese nobility|鳥|tr2=tori|t2=bird}}, from the way that the bird's head [[plumage]] resembles the shape of the ''eboshi'' hat.  {{rendaku2|sort=えぼしどり|tori|dori}}
